outputs.output_descr: The project aims to establish a scholarship mechanism enabling talented students from Chernobyl-affected families and regions to gain better access to high-quality education in the leading universities of the country. The scholarship will provide cash grants to recipients that will enable them to cover the tuition (where not covered by a stipend) and living costs related to their studies (five year scholarships awarded to outstanding students).

project_descr: Maria Sharapova Foundation Scholarship for Youth from the Chernobyl-affected Areas of Belarus
project_title: Maria Sharapova Foundation Scolarship for Youth
